overview.en: Ulam is public consesus built on a non-pow paradigm. With Ulam, mining is energy friendly and fair. Any device with networking capabilities can participate in the mining process thus allowing us to achieve the greatest possible consensus.
overview.zh: Ulam是一个非pow共识公链，持有代币就可以公平的获得挖矿的机会，任何联网设备都可以参与，从而达到最广泛的共识。
